sourcesContent: import { FiPlus, FiMinus } from 'react-icons/fi' import * as S from './styles' export type Props = { quant: number handleAdd: any handleSub: any size?: 'small' | 'medium' | 'large' | 'block' } const QuantController = ({ quant, handleAdd, handleSub, size = 'small' }: Props) => ( {quant} ) export default QuantController
